name: Crowd Buster
description:
Oh My God ! Customers are coming from everywhere ! Please boss, do something !

Crowd Buster is a stress gestion game realised at Isart Digital during its own game jam "Game Week"  .

Because of the theme "10 Billion consumers", we decided to literally integrate the 10 billions consumers. Put on the boss's hat and regulate the crowds by using differents methods such as stands, surprise discounts and even smokes !

You are the master of the consumers's destiny, will you choose to save them ? ...

GAME SPECS:

  • Running on Unity 2021.3.5f1
  • Game made in 4 days
  • Windows build only
  • Run even on a discount toaster
